title: Code Example
Conclusion
content:
The splice method in JavaScript modifies an array by removing, replacing, or adding elements.

Syntax: array.splice(start, deleteCount, item1, item2, ...)
Explanation (using the example):
arr.splice(2, 2, 6, 7);
Starts at index 2 (3 in the array).
Removes 2 elements (3 and 4).
Inserts 6 and 7 at the same position.
Final array: [1, 2, 6, 7, 5].
